[[File:The Rings of Power (TV series) - Dragonfly.png|thumb|A dragonfly from [[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power|The Rings of Power]] TV series.]]
'''Fauna of Arda''' is a list of [[kelvar|animals]] in [[Arda]]. 
<small>
*''Note: Individual animals are not included.''</small>
